remarks: The intersection of two different hyperplanes is not a hyperplane. (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lshpin.h $e |- H = ( LSHyp ` W ) $.
lshpin.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lshpin.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. H ) $.
lshpin.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. H ) $.
lshpinN $p |- ( ph -> ( ( T i^i U ) e. H <-> T = U ) ) $.
